src segment: Your sister called you Marc.

ref segment: Nadie ha tratado de detener vuestro ímpetu... u os ha dicho que no?
src segment: No one has ever stopped you, or said to you "no"?

ref segment: Pero el Padre no os perdonará.
src segment: But the Father will not forgive you.

ref segment: No os ve desde hace 16 años. - Don Urbano.
src segment: He has not been seeing you for 16 years.

ref segment: Así como el enamorado deshoja la margarita, así os iré despojando de los ardientes pétalos que os cubren.
src segment: Just as a lover picks petals off a daisy, I'll pick one by one the burning petals covering you.

ref segment: ¿También os ha desnudado el romano?
src segment: Did the Roman guy strip you too?

ref segment: - ¿Qué es lo que os pasa?
src segment: -What's the matter with you all?

ref segment: - ¿Pero como querías que os avisara?
src segment: - But how could I have warned you?

ref segment: Señor Kamio, ¿No os importa que el Shogunato se esté debilitando?
src segment: Lord Kamio, doesn't the shogunate's weakness concern you?

ref segment: Ya os dije a los dos que no quería que os sentarais juntos.
src segment: I told you two I did not want to see you sitting next to each other.

ref segment: - Bueno, que os divirtáis.
src segment: Well, 'ave a good time both of you. Thanks.

ref segment: Quien quiera que seáis, hermanos míos, creyentes o paganos, os hablo en nombre de los dioses, y os digo que no debéis profanar los templos.
src segment: Whatever you are, pagans or pious Egyptians, I beseech you in the name of the Gods not to violate the temples!

ref segment: De todos modos, cómo os envidiaba.
src segment: Anyway, how I used to envy you.

ref segment: ¿Se os ha ocurrido pensar que nosotras éramos así?
src segment: Has it ever occurred to you, girls, that we used to parade around like that?

ref segment: ¡Habéis dejado el campo de batalla incluso el estandarte que César os dio cuando él mismo fundó esta legion!
src segment: You left on the battlefield even the flag that Caesar gave you when he founded this legion!

ref segment: ¡Largo de aquí, cerdos... si no queréis que os tumbe!
src segment: Get the hell out of here, you swine, or I'll deck you! I'll tear you to shreds!

ref segment: ¿Os he hecho esperar?
src segment: Have I kept you waiting?

ref segment: Y digo no "somos" pensando que aceptaréis el puesto que os ofrezco.
src segment: I say "we" on the assumption you'll accept the post at York I've offered you.

ref segment: ¿Cuánto valia la copa que os regaló?
src segment: This goblet he gave you, how much was it worth?

ref segment: ¿Y si el rey os ordenara que le repitáis lo que yo haya dicho?
src segment: And if the King should command you to repeat what I may say?

ref segment: Amigos mios, todos vosotros sabéis por qué os he llamado aqui.
src segment: My friends, you all know why I've called you here.

ref segment: Sin embargo, ¿sabéis que aún ahora, si estuvieseis dispuesto a ceder... ante la lglesia, las universidades y el Parlamento, no habria honor que su majestad os negara?
src segment: And yet, do you know that even now, if you could bring yourself... to agree with the Church, universities, the Lords and the Commons... there is no honor which His Majesty would be likely to deny you?

ref segment: Y os diga lo que os diga, no existen pruebas que apoyen esta acusación.
src segment: And whatever he may have said to you... he will not give evidence to support this accusation.

ref segment: Entonces os agradezco que estéis conmigo.
src segment: Then it's good of you to be seen with me.

ref segment: Me dijisteis que os hablara.
src segment: You said that I might approach you.

ref segment: Ya os lo he dicho. No hay oro.
src segment: I tell you, there ain't any gold.

ref segment: Eso es lo que os impide hablar.
src segment: That's what's keeping you from talking.

ref segment: Podéis legar a vuestra familia, todos los bienes que el Rey os ha dado.
src segment: You may bequeath to your family all the goods which the king has given you.

ref segment: Es un trabajo, me temo, que ya no os ocupará mucho tiempo más.
src segment: I'm afraid it's a job which won't keep you busy much longer.

ref segment: - Y yo os dejo todo.
src segment: I leave everything to you.

ref segment: Monsieur Colbert, os confirmo en el cargo de Agregado Financiero de Monsieur Fouquet.
src segment: Mr. Colbert, I appoint you to the post of finance bursar next to Mr. Fouquet.

ref segment: Y pedisteis a Mignard que os pintara a los dos tal cual si fueseis Apolo y su pastora.
src segment: And you've asked Mignard to paint you both. You as Apollo and she as a shepherdess at your side, as if the queen didn't exist.

ref segment: De todas maneras, os arrastra vuestra imaginación.
src segment: Besides, you may be letting your imagination run away with you.

ref segment: Monsieur D'Artagnan, la misión que os confío debe permanecer secreta hasta que la podáis llevar a cabo.
src segment: Mr. D'Artagnan, the mission I'm assigning you must be kept secret until you have carried it out.

ref segment: Monsieur de Vardes os he hecho llamar y estoy muy contento de veros.
src segment: Mr. De Vardes, I've summoned you. I am pleased to see you.

ref segment: Seguro que os pide dinero.
src segment: She'll put the bite on you for sure.

ref segment: ¿Qué os pasa?
src segment: What's between you two?

ref segment: Os he avisado.
src segment: I warned you.

ref segment: Espero que tengáis suerte, y que todo os salga bien.
src segment: I hope you have luck, and I hope it goes smooth and easy for you.

ref segment: - Que os ayuden los de cubierta.
src segment: - Get the deck aides to help you.

ref segment: os paso el control por radio en cinco segundos, cuatro, tres,
src segment: Radio control over to you in five seconds, four, three,

ref segment: Vaya, os vuelvo a dejar solos, ¿y os detienen?
src segment: Well, I left you alone again, and you got raided?

ref segment: Yo os digo que debemos responder a la violencia con la misma moneda.
src segment: That's why I tell you: An eye for an eye!

ref segment: Winnetou os enseñará dónde está el oro.
src segment: Winnetou will show you where the gold is.

ref segment: lo que yo os mando para llevar a cabo sus pedidos!
src segment: I command you to carry out your orders!

ref segment: ¿Soy yo? El santo es quien os maldecirá.
src segment: I'm not. lt's San Gennaro cursing you.

ref segment: El lugar donde os llevo está muy cerca de la estatua.
src segment: I'll take you closer.

ref segment: A cambio, os suplico que salvéis las vidas de los demás... y también que vuelva a reinar la paz para los Chigusa y los Nagoshi.
src segment: I give my life to you, but you must save the others. And... bring peace back to Chigusa and Nagoshi.

ref segment: Quiere decir que no os necesitan.
src segment: He means that they can't use you.

ref segment: Una larga historia que os contaré en otro momento.
src segment: A long story that I'll tell you some other time.

ref segment: El Rey no os paga por sentaros aquí todo el día.
src segment: The King doesn't pay you to lay around here all day.

ref segment: No sé quién os ha enviado... pero sólo vivís una vez.
src segment: I don't know who sent you, but you only get one life.

ref segment: Una vez tengan el oro, ¡os matarán para encubrir el robo!
src segment: Once they have the gold, they'll kill you both to cover up the theft!

ref segment: Y cada día os veo a los dos, sin contar al ejército, viajes por negocios y otras razones asumibles.
src segment: And everyday I see both of you, not counting the army, business trips and other understandable reasons.

ref segment: Si corréis, os dispararé.
src segment: If you run, I'll shoot you down.

ref segment: El doctor no os abandonará.
src segment: He won't forget you.

ref segment: ¿Os tengo que ayudar?
src segment: You maybe want me to help you ?

ref segment: - ¡Nada os diría con suplicios!
src segment: I would not tell you on compulsion.

ref segment: Mi lord, dijo que erais un asno, y un cuco y que os iba a apalear.
src segment: My lord, he'd call you an ass and a crafty,... -...he would cudgel you.

ref segment: ¡Dios os guarde, sir John!
src segment: Heaven bless you, Sir John!

ref segment: El príncipe de Gales dijo ante el Rey que os desafía a singular combate.
src segment: The Prince of Wales said before the king, he would defy you... -...you in battle.

ref segment: Y si sabemos que os habéis reformado, entonces, de acuerdo con vuestras facultades y méritos, os ocuparemos.
src segment: And if we hear of thy ammendment, then, we shall take you back with thy merits and faculties.

ref segment: Eh, volved. ¿Vais a dejar que un tipo solo os ahuyente?
src segment: Hey, come back. You gonna let one little fella chase you away?

ref segment: Que os ha nacido hoy, en la ciudad de David un salvador que es Cristo, el Señor.
src segment: For unto you is born this day, in the city of David, a savior which is Christ the Lord.

ref segment: Esto os servirá de señal.
src segment: And this shall be a sign unto you.

ref segment: Que os ha nacido hoy en la ciudad de David un salvador, que es Cristo el Señor.
src segment: For unto you is born this day in the city of David, a savior, which is Christ the Lord.

ref segment: Esto os servirá de señal.
src segment: And this shall be a sign unto you.

ref segment: Ya os había dicho que tenía un club de fans.
src segment: I told you girls I had a fan club out here.

ref segment: Les rodearemos, para que si no resultan amistosos,... ... novuelvansobrenuestrospasosy os encuentren.
src segment: We'll approach them in a circle so if they prove to be unfriendly they won't double back and find you.

ref segment: ¿ y quién os reveló que tal niño nacería rey en mi reino?
src segment: Who told you about such a child who was to be born a king in my kingdom?

ref segment: Vuestra gracia observará que incluso este mensaje va dirigido a ese querido y nada ceremonioso apelativo por el que toda Inglaterra os conoce.
src segment: Even this is addressed to the beloved, if inaccurate, nickname the whole of England knows you by, "Lady L."

ref segment: Gringos, si alguno dispara antes de la señal, os juro por Dios que os mato.
src segment: Any of you damn gringos fire before the signal... I swear to God I kill you.

ref segment: La suerte de Searcy os protege.
src segment: The Searcy luck's protecting you.

ref segment: - El duque os saluda.
src segment: - The duke does greet you.

ref segment: No os había visto, bienvenido, noble "signior".
src segment: I did not see you. Welcome, gentle signor.

ref segment: La misma obediencia que os dio mi madre, colocándoos ante su padre, me parece que debo profesar al moro, mi marido.
src segment: And so much duty as my mother showed to you preferring you before her father so much I challenge that I may profess due to the Moor, my lord.

ref segment: Tenemos allí un sustituto de probada experiencia, mas nuestra opinión, sabia consejera, os concede un voto más seguro.
src segment: And though we have there a substitute of most allowed sufficiency yet opinion, a sovereign mistress of effects throws a more safer voice on you.

ref segment: Otelo, dejad atrás a un oficial. Os llevará nuestras órdenes y las demás cosas que os interesan y conciernen.
src segment: Othello, leave some officer behind and he shall our commission bring to you with such things else of courtesy and respect as doth concern.

ref segment: De ello hablan el general y Desdémona, ella os defiende.
src segment: The general and his wife are talking of it and she speaks for you stoutly.

ref segment: El moro replica que heristeis a un hombre afamado y amado por Chipre. Y que por prudencia, debe despediros. Pero afirma que os estima mucho y que sólo necesita su afecto para restituiros en vuestro puesto.
src segment: The Moor replies that he you hurt is of great fame in Cyprus and great affinity and that in wholesome wisdom, he might not but refuse you but he protests he loves you and needs no other suitor but his likings to take the safest occasion by the front to bring you in again.

ref segment: El mismo Miguel Cassio que os acompañaba a cortejarme y os defendía cuando yo os denigraba.
src segment: What, Michael Cassio that came a-wooing with you. And many a time when I have spoke of you dispraisingly hath ta'en your part to have so much to do to bring him in.

ref segment: Es como si os rogara que llevarais guantes, o comieseis platos nutritivos, o que os abrigarais, o que actuarais en vuestro beneficio.
src segment: 'Tis as I should entreat you wear your gloves or feed on nourishing dishes, or keep you warm or sue to you to do a peculiar profit to your own person.

ref segment: - Señor, sabéis que os quiero.
src segment: - My lord, you know I love you.

ref segment: Mas, perdonadme, no me refiero a ella, aunque temo que su voluntad, volviendo a mejor juicio, no os coloque a la altura de sus paisanos y se arrepienta.
src segment: But pardon me, I do not in position distinctly speak of her though I may fear her will, recoiling to her better judgment may fall to match you with her country forms and happily repent.

ref segment: El duque y los senadores os saludan.
src segment: The duke and senators of venice greet you.

ref segment: No me quedaré si os molesto.
src segment: I will not stay to offend you. LoDo vlCo:

ref segment: Lamento veros en este trance, os buscaba.
src segment: I am sorry to find you thus. I have been to seek you.

ref segment: Apiadaos también, jamás os ofendí.
src segment: I never did offend you in my life.

ref segment: No os había reconocido, tío.
src segment: I scarce did know you, uncle.

ref segment: Olvidáis con facilidad las buenas obras que os han hecho.
src segment: Your memory is short and you forget quickly the good deeds done to you.

ref segment: Señor, os comprendo perfectamente.
src segment: Señor, I understand you perfectly well.

ref segment: Vuestro padre duerme e Inesilla os está esperando.
src segment: Your father is asleep and Inezillia is waiting for you.

ref segment: Aunque estoy emparentado con los mejores banqueros de España, viendo lo bien que estáis comerciando los filipinos, os daré un depósito de un millón para formar una sociedad limitada.
src segment: Though I am related to the greatest bankers in Spain, seeing how well you are trading with the Philippines, I will deposit a million with you for a limited partnership.

ref segment: Mi señor recibió vuestra misiva y ruega que os informe que el capital de Livárdez fue registrado en los libros.
src segment: My principal received your letter and begs to inform you that the Livardez capital was entered into the books.

ref segment: Inés os ama más que a su vida.
src segment: Inez loves you more than her life.

ref segment: Quiere que os encontréis con ella en este mismo lugar a la puesta del sol.
src segment: She wants to meet you at the same spot tomorrow at sunset.

ref segment: Siempre que os veo, temo que sea la última vez
src segment: Whenever I see you, I am always afraid I won't see you again.

ref segment: El no os guarda ningún rencor.
src segment: He holds nothing against you.

ref segment: Mis hijos pequeños os tienen un miedo terrible.
src segment: My young children are terribly afraid of you.

ref segment: Si el ejército Hachiro te captura vivo, os torturarán hasta morir.
src segment: If the Hachiro army captures you alive, they'll torture you to death.

ref segment: Katie me pidió que os atendiera, si acudíais al funeral.
src segment: Katie asked me to look in on you, ifyou came to the funeral.

ref segment: Creía que os había enseñado a no bañaros con la ropa puesta.
src segment: I thought I taught you better than to take a bath with your clothes on.

ref segment: Si esta tierra os agrada, a mí también.
src segment: This land serves you, I serve you.

ref segment: Para empezar, no os invité a la nave.
src segment: I didn't even invite you into the ship in the first place.

ref segment: Alguien os ha pagado para matarme.
src segment: Someone offered to pay you to kill me.

ref segment: Si mi propuesta os agrada, entonces quizás seáis tan amables de dejarme pasar.
src segment: If my proposal is agreeable to you, then perhaps you'd be so kind as to let me through.

ref segment: La historia que os hemos contado está a punto de terminar.
src segment: Be it agreeable to you or not the true-to-life content of our plot,

ref segment: Y os prometo que os traeré de vuelta los mil ryo.
src segment: And I promise you, I'll get your thousand ryo back for you.

ref segment: Veca, Camarada Kole por fin os encuentro
src segment: Veca, brother Kole! I've finally caught up with you.

ref segment: Creo que podremos decir que los ladrones entraron en el apartamento y os atacaron.
src segment: I think we can say that unknown thieves entered your flat and they attacked you.

ref segment: Eso os muestra de que está hecho nuestro jefe.
src segment: Shows you what our boss is made of.

ref segment: ¿Por qué no os ha convocado el Intendente a los dos en su propia residencia?
src segment: Why didn't the magistrate summon both of you to his own residence?

ref segment: ¿He hecho algo que os ofenda?
src segment: Have I done something to offend you?

ref segment: Os he visto.
src segment: I saw you.

ref segment: Creo que ha llegado el momento de que os conozcáis.
src segment: I think it's time the two of you met face to face.

ref segment: Ya os dije que no os esperaría.
src segment: I told you I wouldn't wait for you.

ref segment: Hasta que averiguara lo contrario, os trataría como enemigos potenciales.
src segment: Until I knew otherwise, I had to treat you as potential enemies.

ref segment: Sería absurdo pensar que os enviaría a viajar en algo así.
src segment: I wouldn't think of asking you to travel in such an absurd way.

ref segment: Sólo que éste os permitirá cruzar el espacio, no el tiempo.
src segment: Except that this will enable you to cross space, not time.

ref segment: Los Sensorites podrían intentar impedir que os vayáis.
src segment: The Sensorites may try to prevent you from leaving.

ref segment: Además os alimentan y os mantienen con vida.
src segment: Furthermore they even feed you and keep you alive.

ref segment: Ahora os recuerdo a todos, nada de violencia, a menos que los Sensorites ataquen antes.
src segment: Now remember all of you; no violence unless the Sensorites start it first.

ref segment: ¡Marreck se queda solo...! Y os manda a la mierda.
src segment: Marec stays on his own and tells you to fuck off !

ref segment: Y abusando de la confianza... que habéis puesto en él, os roba descaradamente.
src segment: He betrays your trust... and robs you shamelessly.

ref segment: Este hombre os ha engañado.
src segment: This man has tricked you.

ref segment: - Mi padre os ahorcará por esto.
src segment: - My father will hang you for this...

ref segment: Pedid a San Plácido amistades santas, que os salven de todo peligro.
src segment: Pray to St Placide for holy friendships... to save you from evil.

ref segment: Y yo os la di.
src segment: And I gave it to you.

ref segment: Cuando nos enfrentemos a los franceses en el campo de batalla... habrá respuestas sencillas para todo. Mientras Becket deba improvisar su honor... de día en día, os servirá devotamente.
src segment: When we face the French on the field of battle there will be simple answers to everything, so long as Becket must improvise his honor from day to day, he will serve you faithfully.

ref segment: Su Ilustrísima os recibirá aquí.
src segment: His Grace, will receive you here.

ref segment: Era él quien os engatusaba lejos... de los deberes que me debíais.
src segment: It was he who lured you away from the duties you owed to me.

ref segment: Creo que os juzgué mal, la amistad me cegó.
src segment: I believe I misjudged you, friendship blinded me.

ref segment: Todo lo que os he confiado... ha sido mi odio, no mi amor.
src segment: All I confided to you was my hate, not my love.

ref segment: Pero después de eso nunca os vi... excepto en un corredor cuando ibais a un baile, o con vuestra corona y vuestro manto de armiño... 10 minutos antes de las ceremonias oficiales... cuando estabais obligada a tolerar mi presencia.
src segment: But after that I never saw you except in a passageway on your way to a ball, or in your crown and ermine mantle 10 minutes before official ceremonies when you were forced to tolerate my presence. No!

ref segment: Como cabeza de la Iglesia de Inglaterra... y como su padre espiritual, os prohíbo que me juzguéis.
src segment: As head of the Church of England and as your spiritual father, I forbid you to pass judgment on me.

ref segment: Permitidme que os provea... con algunas prendas francesas... elaboradas por este artesano nuestro. No le llevará más de dos semanas.
src segment: Would you permit me to furnish you with some French garments made by our craftsmen here, it will only take two weeks?

ref segment: Por tanto, os ruega... que no permitáis a este criminal... que resida en vuestros territorios, ni permitáis que ninguno de vuestros vasallos... le dé consejo o ayuda.
src segment: He therefore entreats you not to allow this criminal to reside within your territories, nor to permit any of your vassals to give counsel or support to him.

ref segment: Su Santidad os recibirá ahora.
src segment: His Holiness will receive you now.

ref segment: Siempre os dije que hay que combatir al frío... con las armas del frío.
src segment: I always told you one must fight the cold with the cold's weapons.

ref segment: Sabéis que comprendo vuestro rencor hacia él, pero no dejéis que esto os lleve a hacer algo... de lo que os podríais arrepentir amargamente.
src segment: You know I understand your hatred for him, but do not let it lead you into an action, which you may bitterly regret.

ref segment: ¡Al diablo, con toda mi familia, si él os acepta!
src segment: To the devil, with my whole family, if he'll have you!

ref segment: Creo que será mejor que os lo explique el sr.
src segment: I think it's better if Mr King explains it to you.

ref segment: ¿Tanto os ha desilusionado Londres?
src segment: London has disappointed you so much?

ref segment: Si es esa la verdadera razón, podemos conversar durante el viaje, porque, si no os importa, os acompaño.
src segment: If that's the only thing that keeps you, we can talk on the way, for I don't mind accompanying you.

ref segment: ¿Os envía mi hermano?
src segment: Did my brother send you?

ref segment: Nadie os detiene.
src segment: No one is holding you.

ref segment: Sentaos todos aquí, escuchad bien lo que os dirá vuestra madre.
src segment: Everybody sit down around here, just listen carefully to what your mother is telling you.

ref segment: si alguien os pregunta si hay un marciano en casa, ¿qué contestáis?
src segment: if someone asks you if there's a martian in your home, what do you reply?

ref segment: Si os meten en la cárcel a pan y agua, si os torturan con hierros al rojo vivo, ¿qué contestáis?
src segment: If they put you in jail with a bread-and-water diet, if they torture your flesh by red-hot irons, what do you reply?

ref segment: Vendrá otro cura, guapo y elegante que os pondrá a todos en cintura.
src segment: Another priest will come, ...handsome and elegant one who will settle all of you.

ref segment: —Tanja os ha traicionado.
src segment: ¬ Tanja has betrayed you.

ref segment: Yo os pido a todos que así como hasta ahora habéis callado ese hecho, en adelante lo ocultéis.
src segment: I pray you all, If you have hitherto concealed this, Let it be so still.

ref segment: Aunque, ¿Por qué delitos os ha traído aquí vuestra mala suerte , a vivir en prisión?
src segment: But what have you deserved at the hands of Fortune, that she sends you to prison hither?

ref segment: Señor, ¿permitiréis que os diga una palabra?
src segment: Good my lord, vouchsafe me a word with you.

ref segment: Os ruego que os cuidéis sin dilación durante el viaje.
src segment: Arm you, I pray you, to this speedy voyage.

ref segment: Entonces, permitid que el Rey, hinchado con el vino, os lleve otra vez al lecho y allí os acaricie, apretando lascivo vuestras mejillas.
src segment: Let the bloat king tempt you again to bed, And let him, for a pair of reechy kisses,

ref segment: Pues, señor, el Rey me manda que os informe de que ha hecho una grande apuesta en vuestro favor.
src segment: His majesty bade me signify to you, that he has laid a wager on your head.

ref segment: El Rey ha apostado que si batalláis con Laertes, en doce contiendas este os dará no más de tres botonazos.
src segment: The king has laid, that in a dozen passes between yourself and him, Laertes shall not exceed you three hits.

ref segment: César os necesita. Os está esperando en su tienda.
src segment: Caesar wants to see you.

ref segment: ¿Os han torturado?
src segment: Did they tortured you?

ref segment: Jan, Jan, supongo que no tiene sentido que os presente.
src segment: Jan, Jan, I guess there's really no point in introducing you two.

ref segment: - Os dije que os quedárais. - ¿Y...?
src segment: - I thought I told you lot to stop here.

ref segment: -Espero que no os haya visto nadie.
src segment: I hope nobody saw you! - No one.

ref segment: Dad y se os dará.
src segment: Give and it shall be given unto you.

ref segment: Contratáis a un pistolero y dejáis que os robe.
src segment: Your own hired hand, and you're letting him thieve you and walk away.

ref segment: ¡El Renacer de Arizona os llama!
src segment: The Arizona Revival calls you!

ref segment: Como os he dicho, la historia incluye 19 canciones secretas y 5 poemas secretos.
src segment: As I told you there are nineteen secret songs and five secret poems besides the main story.

ref segment: No os verá nadie, pero no vayáis juntos.
src segment: Nobody would see you there. But you better not go together.

ref segment: Os he oído hablar esta mañana.
src segment: I heard you and Marnie this morning right out here.

ref segment: La abuelita os esconderá.
src segment: Granny'll hide you!

ref segment: Bert os cuidará como un padre.
src segment: Bert'll take care of you like I was your own father.

ref segment: - ¿Quién os sigue?
src segment: - Now, who's after you?

ref segment: - Vuestro padre os llama.
src segment: - Your father's calling you.

ref segment: Mi marido os conseguirá el dinero.
src segment: My husband will raise money for you.

ref segment: Os he convocado porque tengo algo que deciros.
src segment: I called you because I've something to tell you.

ref segment: No se os permitirá.
src segment: Mothra can't help you.

ref segment: "Chicos", dijo él, "no me conocéis Y tampoco os importa... "
src segment: And, "Boys, " says he, "you don 't know me and none of you care a darn..."

ref segment: Dejad que os ponga en situación.
src segment: Let me put you in the mood.

ref segment: Eso es menos de lo que espero que os suceda a los dos.
src segment: That's more than I can say for either of you.

ref segment: Y la otra mitad, os la repartís.
src segment: The other half to be divided between you two.

ref segment: Una mitad para mí. Y la otra mitad, os la repartís.
src segment: Half for me, the other half divided between you two.

ref segment: Para llamar por teléfono os dais buena maña...
src segment: - l can rely on you to call.

ref segment: Así que os doy las gracias por todo.
src segment: So I'm gonna thank you for the whole thing.

ref segment: Debería haber pagado la multa que os pusieron.
src segment: You were supposed to make payments on that judgment against you.

ref segment: ¿Os ha visto juntos alguno
src segment: Did any of Judy's friends see you together?

ref segment: Él os bautizará... con el Espíritu Santo y con fuego.
src segment: He will baptize you with the Holy Ghost and with fire.

ref segment: Cuidaros de los hombres porque os arrastrarán ante las autoridades... y os azotarán en las sinagogas.
src segment: Do not put your trust in men. They will deliver you to courts and scourge you in their synagogues.

ref segment: Así trataron a los profetas que os precedieron.
src segment: So it was they persecuted the prophets who went before you.

ref segment: Yo os aseguro que Salomón en toda su gloria... no se vistió como uno de esos lirios.
src segment: And yet I tell you that even Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these.

ref segment: De todos modos, el río os refrescará algo.
src segment: Still, the river cools you off a bit, though?

ref segment: Si él os ha abandonado, siempre se le puede hacer pagar.
src segment: If he's deserted you, he can always be made to pay.

ref segment: Tarde o temprano, por fuerza, se os hiere.
src segment: Sooner or later we must hurt you.

ref segment: Eso os va bien.
src segment: It suits you.

ref segment: No quiero presumir pero os lo había dicho.
src segment: Sorry to boast, but I told you so.

ref segment: - Tratabais de obligarme a que os devuelva a Inglaterra.
src segment: -You tried to force me to return you to England.

ref segment: - Cuando el Gran Kublai Khan aparezca le reverenciaréis. Él os mirará con compasión y perdonará vuestras despreciables vidas.
src segment: - When great Kublai Khan appears, you will make your obeisance to him so that he may look kindly upon you, and spare your worthless lives.

ref segment: - Vale, os veré fuera de prisión.
src segment: I'll see you outside the prison.

ref segment: ¿No ves que os he descubierto?
src segment: Can't you see I've found you out?

ref segment: - Os dije que os trataría como enemigos.
src segment: I told you I'd treat you as enemies.

ref segment: ¿No se os ocurrió?
src segment: Hadn't it occurred to you?

ref segment: Cuando creí que os atacaba, hasta yo estuve en su contra.
src segment: When I thought he was going to attack you, even I was against him.

ref segment: Os acusé injustamente, así que te decidiste a demostrar mi error.
src segment: Because I accused you unjustly, you were determined to prove me wrong.

ref segment: Una vez dentro, si no hay rastro de Barbara, os alcanzaré lo más rápido posible.
src segment: Once inside... Well, if there's no sign of Barbara, I'll follow you as quickly as I can.

ref segment: ¿Cómo puedes probar que Arbitan os envió?
src segment: What have you done to him? How can you prove that Arbitan sent you?

ref segment: Ping-Cho primero me debe lealtad a mí, sin embargo ella os apoya contra Tegana.
src segment: Ping-Cho's first loyalty is to me, yet she backs you against Tegana.

ref segment: pero ellos os llamaron...
src segment: But they called you...

ref segment: Bueno, ellos os llaman mutaciones.
src segment: Well, they called you mutations.

ref segment: - Danielle os acompañará.
src segment: Danielle will escort you.

ref segment: Ni sabíamos que os hacía daño.
src segment: We didn't even know sound hurt you.

ref segment: Pero eso os lo debe poner muy difícil.
src segment: But that must make it very difficult for you.

ref segment: Sí, sabéis donde está escondida porque Chesterton os dijo donde la oculto.
src segment: Yes, you know where it's hidden because Chesterton told you where he hid it.

ref segment: No, antes os habrían devorado los lobos.
src segment: Nah, the wolves would've eaten you first.

ref segment: ¿Qué fue lo que os asustó?
src segment: What was it that frightened you?

ref segment: Oíd, oíd, creo que esto os interesará.
src segment: I say, I say, I think these will interest you.

ref segment: ¡Yo, Ixta el guerrero electo, os lideraré con orgullo a la gloria!
src segment: I, Ixta the Chosen Warrior, shall proudly lead you to your glory.

ref segment: Me encargó que os dijera que trae un mensaje del viejo.
src segment: He said to tell you he's getting a message from the old man.

ref segment: Za os entregará al tigre.
src segment: Za will give you to the tiger.

ref segment: Za os entregará al frío.
src segment: Za will give you to the cold.

ref segment: Llevadme a mi nave y os haré fuego.
src segment: Take me back to my ship and I will make fire for you.

ref segment: ¡y luego os deja a oscuras!
src segment: and then leave you to the dark!

ref segment: Si me enseñáis cómo hacer fuego, os llevaré de vuelta al pie de las montañas.
src segment: If you show me how to make fire, I will take you back to the foot of the mountains.

ref segment: Za os mataría si pudiera oíros.
src segment: Za will kill you if he could hear you!

ref segment: Sí. Y yo fui el idiota que os lo dio.
src segment: Yes.....and I was the fool who gave it to you.

ref segment: ¿Qué os he hecho?
src segment: What did I do to you?

ref segment: Nunca os he visto.
src segment: I've never even met you.

ref segment: No os lo he pedido.
src segment: I didn't ask you.

ref segment: Eso no os afecta, pero esto sí:
src segment: Alright, this doesn't concern you. But this does!

ref segment: Ese hombre que os condenó por condenar nuestra idelogía.
src segment: - Bellinzoni! The very man who condemned you for your ideologies!

ref segment: Y lo que os pido no es difícil para gente como vosotros.
src segment: What I ask you in exchange is not difficult for men like you.

ref segment: Apenas os he dejado un momento solos habéis armado un escándalo y yo lo he pagado, asunto concluido.
src segment: I just left you alone for a moment, and you turned it into a disaster... And I had to pay. But you see, all will go well.

ref segment: "Pues el fuego y el apresurado dios de la guerra os derrotarán".
src segment: "For fire and the headlong god of war shall bring you low. "

ref segment: ¿Quizá esperáis que os de las gracias?
src segment: Do you expect me to thank you?

ref segment: Diría que os divierte...
src segment: It seems to amuse you...

ref segment: ¿Quién os lo advirtió?
src segment: Who told you?

ref segment: No os he visto.
src segment: I didn't see you.

ref segment: ¡No os he visto!
src segment: I didn't see you!

ref segment: Todos los que os consideráis normales.
src segment: All of you who call yourselves normal!

ref segment: El cielo os ha traído porque quiere que os quedéis aquí.
src segment: Heaven put you here because it meant for you to stay right here.

ref segment: Yo os pagaré.
src segment: I'll pay you up.

ref segment: Quizás el que no os guste sea una buena señal porque todo lo demás en que creíais ha resultado estar equivocado.
src segment: Perhaps it's a good sign that neither of you take to him... because it seems that everything else that you've welcomed with open arms... has turned out dead wrong.

ref segment: De repente estáis aquí y os puedo abrazar.
src segment: And now you're suddenly here, and I'm able to hold you both close in my arms.

ref segment: Él no os quiere aquí.
src segment: He doesn't want you here.

ref segment: Pero ellos no se hacen responsables si su dios os come a ambos.
src segment: But they will take no responsibility if their god eats you both.

ref segment: Mañana dejaré que los turcos os compren, amigos de Feisal.
src segment: Tomorrow, maybe I will allow the Turks to buy you, friends of Feisal.

ref segment: Esperamos que os gane el trofeo de la carrera de fondo.
src segment: We're hoping he'll take away that long-distance challenge cup from you.

ref segment: Qué bien os vendría si fuera verdad.
src segment: It would serve all of you right if it was true.

ref segment: La mayoría ya os habéis mojado:
src segment: Most of you have had your feet wet before:

ref segment: ¿Y quién os llevó a venderlo a Puerta Portesse, donde Gennarino el Trovador?
src segment: Who took you to Gennarino, the second-hand dealer? I did.

ref segment: Recordáis que os dije que a veces se cambia o se añade algo, con cosas llamadas enmiendas.
src segment: You remember I told you it had to be added to and changed sometimes, by things called amendments.

ref segment: Decid a los rancheros del norte que os contrataron que yo, Link Appleyard, os eché de la ciudad, ¡y lo haré otra vez si volvéis por aquí!
src segment: Tell those ranchers north of the Picketwire that hired you that me, Link Appleyard, run you out of town, and I'll do it again if you ever come back!

ref segment: ¿Se os ha ocurrido que no quería deber nada?
src segment: Did it occur to you, either of you, that I didn't want to be obligated?

ref segment: ¿Qué os trae por aquí hoy?
src segment: What brings you here today?

ref segment: ¿Qué os trae por aquí?
src segment: What brings you here?

ref segment: Una vez más, os ruego que os arrepintáis y neguéis esas voces que afirmáis oír. Declaraos hereje. No lo haré.
src segment: d Once again d d I beg you to repent d d and renounce these voices you hear d d Declare yourself a heretic d d No, I will not.

ref segment: Allí no se os ha perdido nada.
src segment: There's nothing there for you.

ref segment: A propósito, deberíais estar felices de que os escuchara de casualidad.
src segment: By the way, you should be glad I overheard you.

ref segment: En vez de esto, os está incitando a la rebelión.
src segment: Instead, he's inciting you to revolt.

ref segment: Si sus hombres os ven, tendréis problemas.
src segment: If their men see you, you're in trouble.

ref segment: "...vuestro padre que tanto os quiere".
src segment: "...your father that loves you so much."

ref segment: Por eso, os he dejado a solas con ella un momento.
src segment: That's why I left you alone with her for a minute.

ref segment: Leni os llevará a vuestra habitación.
src segment: Leni will take you to your residence.

ref segment: Parece que tener invitados os sienta bien.
src segment: Entertaining guests seems to agree with you.

ref segment: ¿No os acompaño la Reina?
src segment: Did not the Queen accompany you?

ref segment: ¡Si os llego a pillar juntos...!
src segment: If I ever catch the two of you together, I'll... don't forget!

ref segment: Eso es justo lo que os reprocho.
src segment: That's exactly what I hold against you.

ref segment: Es vuestra madre quien os ha enviado. Porque hoy habéis venido los dos a la vez.
src segment: It's your mother that has sent you so that I could have you both together, today!

ref segment: Yo no soy el mundo. El mundo está ahí fuera y os necesita.
src segment: The world's out there, and it needs you.

ref segment: Cuando un superior os invita a dar un paseo, debéis pasear. Te ahorrarás 4 días a la sombra.
src segment: If a superior invites you for a ride, my friend, just enjoy it or you'll end up under arrest.

ref segment: No os había reconocido.
src segment: I didn't recognise you.

ref segment: ¡Marchaos, esta vez os mato!
src segment: Go away or I'll kill you!

ref segment: Tiene millones de dólares, y él os respeta. ¿Cree que eso es normal?
src segment: You're loaded, and he's not trying to sleep with you. What do you think is normal?

ref segment: No os escucharé más.
src segment: I will not listen to you any more.

ref segment: Sólo tenéis que preguntarle a mi hijo, y él os dirá.
src segment: You have only to ask my son, and he will tell you.

ref segment: En nombre de Fernando, rey de Castilla, León y Asturias, os acuso de traición.
src segment: In the name of Ferdinand, King of Castile, Leon and Asturias, I charge you with treason.

ref segment: Dios os ha enviado.
src segment: God has sent you.

ref segment: La gente os apreciará más por ello.
src segment: People will only esteem you the more for it.

ref segment: Nadie os despreciará por no luchar con el Campeón del Rey.
src segment: No-one will spurn you for not fighting the King s Champion.

ref segment: Sabía que Ordóñez os traicionaría.
src segment: I knew Ordonez would betray you.

ref segment: ¡Padre os dejó Castilla y a mí, León y Asturias!
src segment: Father left Castile to you and Asturias and Leon to me!

ref segment: Rodrigo os escuchará.
src segment: Rodrigo will listen to you.

ref segment: Y os pido que os arrodilléis en señal de lealtad.
src segment: I now call upon you to kneeling a sign of fealty.

ref segment: Lograré que os devuelva a mí.
src segment: To make Him bring you back to me.

ref segment: Por eso os he llamado.
src segment: That is why we summoned you here.

ref segment: Agradeced a los dioses que os hayan ayudado en vuestra travesía.
src segment: Give thanks to the gods who aided you on your journey.

ref segment: Soy la reina y debéis saber que el trono es mío... y me lo tenéis que dar, si no os mando a todos a la cárcel.
src segment: I am the queen and you must know that the throne is mine... and you have to give it to me, if not I'll send you all to the caverns.

ref segment: No tenéis ni idea de lo que os puede pasar.
src segment: You don't know what might happen to you.

ref segment: ¿Qué os importa?
src segment: But what's it to you?

ref segment: Por desgracia, la ambición os devora.
src segment: Unfortunately, ambition is devouring you.

ref segment: Os están esperando las doncellas del monasterio, Padre.
src segment: The holy maids are waiting for you, Father.

ref segment: La Madre Superiora os lleva esperando desde ayer por la tarde.
src segment: Mother Superior's been expecting you since yesterday.

ref segment: - Aquí nadie os molestará.
src segment: - No one will disturb you here.

ref segment: El propio viaje os calmará.
src segment: The journey will calm you.

ref segment: Dios os perdonará porque no sabéis lo que hacéis.
src segment: God will forgive you for you know not what you do.

ref segment: Os he dicho que volvía enseguida!
src segment: I told you I'd be right back!

ref segment: Cuando os lleve a casa mi hermano os devolverá a la isla.
src segment: When I get you home my brother will return you to your island.

ref segment: Por cierto, el inspector ha dicho que os interrogará a todos después.
src segment: By the way, the inspector said he'd be interrogating you all later.

ref segment: Ya os lo he dicho.
src segment: I've already told you.

ref segment: Pensé que a ambos os gustaría la novedad.
src segment: I thought the two of you would enjoy the novelty of it.

ref segment: Todos tenéis el discurso que os ha escrito el Juez.
src segment: Now, you all got the speeches the judge wrote for you.

ref segment: Me alegra que el crac de la bolsa no os haya impedido salir esta noche.
src segment: I'm glad the stock market crash didn't keep you from coming out tonight.

ref segment: Yo os alcanzare.
src segment: I'll see you later.

ref segment: Cuántas veces os he dicho que no hagáis el tonto con la cerveza?
src segment: How many times have I told you, not to fool around that beer?

ref segment: Dime dónde tocabais cuando yo os recogí.
src segment: Tell me where you guys were gigging when I picked you up? Tell me that.

ref segment: Me ha parecido oír que hoy el señor os invita.
src segment: I was told that today, Mr. was inviting you.

ref segment: Papá, mamá, os detesto.
src segment: Dad, mom, I hate you.

ref segment: Por orden del marshal McCabe os dejo en libertad.
src segment: By orders of Marshal McCabe, I'm a-turning you loose.

ref segment: Moveos o dejaré que os pudràis.
src segment: Move yourselves or I"ll leave you to rot.

ref segment: Y lo que es màs, para mí, que os traje a esta ciudad... habéis traicionado vuestra fe... y me habéis puesto bajo posible sospecha de connivencia a los ojos del Emperador.
src segment: What is more, you"ve betrayed your faith to me who brought you to this city and laid me under possible suspicion of connivance in the eyes of the Emperor.

ref segment: Vais a ser testigos del castigo de este hombre... para que no pueda haber dudas en vuestra mente... de que las palabras que os dijo fueron una gran violación de la ley.
src segment: You are to witness the punishment of this man so that there can be no doubt in your mind that the words he spoke to you were a gross breach of the law.

ref segment: ¡A ver si os convencéis de que no sirve para nada hacerse el héroe!
src segment: This will convince you that there's no use playing the hero.

ref segment: Si rehusais jugar, deberé informar al Coronel von Stein y es seguro que os hará fusilar. en el mismo terreno.
src segment: If you refuse to play, I have to report it to Colonel Von Stein and no doubt he will have to shoot you right on the spot.

ref segment: Ya os lo he dicho, estáis perdiendo el tiempo.
src segment: I've already told you, jerry. You're wasting your time.

ref segment: Os iremos llamando y os asignaremos a un local.
src segment: We will call you, and assign you to a building.

ref segment: Ahora os voy a casar.
src segment: Now, I'm going to marry you.

ref segment: ¡Os voy a matar!
src segment: I'm going to kill you!

ref segment: Sí, más os vale o mi viejo os atizará con una mano atada a la espalda.
src segment: Yeah, you'd better or my old man will lick you both with one hand tied behind his back.

ref segment: Calentad ese banco de allí hasta que os llame.
src segment: Warm up that bench over there until I call for you.

ref segment: Y mientras, yo os mantengo a todos.
src segment: Me, who feed you all. All of you!

ref segment: Francesco, en vez de que os lleve la niñera, os trae a que desayunéis en casa, ¿eh?
src segment: Before taking you to the nursemaid, doesn't he ever think to feed you at home, does he?

ref segment: Él os indicará cuál es vuestro compañero de...
src segment: And she will tell you who your fellow is

ref segment: ¿Eskith os habló de la gang de Murdock?
src segment: Esketh told you about the Murdoch gang, didn't he?

ref segment: Eso os trastorna, os fastidia los planes...
src segment: That upsets you, rather spoils your plans...

ref segment: Os recibo alto y claro.
src segment: Receiving you loud and clear.

ref segment: Grupos de rastreo os buscan.
src segment: Search parties are looking for you.

ref segment: Partidas de rastreo os buscan.
src segment: Search parties are looking for you.

ref segment: ¿No te diste cuenta ayer de que os seguía?
src segment: Did you notice I followed you last night?

ref segment: Ya os dije que estaba todo por hacer.
src segment: I told you there was a lot to do.

ref segment: Pongo la casa, el terreno, la licencia. Nadie os molestará.
src segment: I've got the house, land, license, no-one will bother you.

ref segment: ¿Cómo os podría ayudar?
src segment: How can I help you?

ref segment: - Entonces os veré allí. - De acuerdo.
src segment: -I'll join you at the Montaldos then.

ref segment: No sé que os pasa.
src segment: What's come over you?

ref segment: Yo os desprecio.
src segment: And I despise you.

ref segment: Pero os aconsejo que os vengáis allí también.
src segment: But I would advise you two to move there too,

ref segment: Les dije que os quedarais lejos del faro!
src segment: I told you to stay away from this light!

ref segment: Trato de impedir que os comportéis como imbéciles.
src segment: Trying to keep you from being a pack of fools.

ref segment: He empezado desde que una noche os vi cogidos del brazo.
src segment: It began one evening, when I saw you arm in arm.

ref segment: - ¿Cómo que dónde os he traído?
src segment: - What do you mean, where did I take you?

ref segment: Pero, ¿qué vais a decirle al Rey? Que la enfermedad os obliga a buscar un sitio mejor para vuestra salud.
src segment: That illness requires you to travel to a region more conducive to your health.

ref segment: Antes de morir, el Duque os ha confiado, señora, bajo mi protección.
src segment: Before he died, the Duke entrusted you to my protection.

ref segment: Pero, permitid que os exprese mi asombro, por este libelo que han repartido por la ciudad.
src segment: However, my astonishment at these libels can hardly surprise you.

ref segment: -¡Hace horas que os ando buscando!
src segment: - I've been looking for you for hours! - Why?

ref segment: Pero hoy en día... ¿Permitís que os acompañe?
src segment: You will allow me to accompany you?

ref segment: Señor, aquí están los gitanos de los que os había hablado.
src segment: My Lord, here are the gypsies whom I spoke to you about.

ref segment: ¿Que os ha llevado a pensar que era la niña de Nevers?
src segment: What led you to believe it was Nevers' daughter?

ref segment: Por eso os aconsejo afectuosamente que no asistáis a esta ceremonia.
src segment: For reasons of affection, I advise you not to attend the ceremony.

ref segment: Dios os protegerá.
src segment: God will protect you.

ref segment: Es necesario para obtener lo que uno quiere de la vida, ...tener audacia e incluso mucha audacia, ...cuando uno no posee ni hermosura ni inteligencia, ...ni el poder con que el Cielo os ha dispensado, señor.
src segment: It is necessary, in order to obtain what one wants in life, to show a little audacity, sometimes even great audacity, when one possesses neither beauty nor intelligence, nor the power which heaven has lavished upon you, my Lord.

ref segment: -Yo, señor, os reconocería siempre. -¿Cómo has venido?
src segment: - I would recognise you anywhere.

ref segment: No sé qué es lo que os embarga, señor, ...pero dudar de todo es vuestro deber.
src segment: I do not know what impels you, sir. But I strongly doubt that it is your duty.

ref segment: Señora, me haríais el honor de entregarme el papel que os entregó mi criado.
src segment: You know well that you are lost. Madame, please give me the paper which my servant gave you.

ref segment: El domingo por la tarde vendré y os invitaré a ir de copas.
src segment: Sunday afternoon, I'll invite you out for a drink.

ref segment: ¡Os he llamado para hablar de sus resultados!
src segment: I've called you here to talk about its outcome!

ref segment: Os visto, os pago las fianzas para que podáis salir de la cárcel, ...cuando os mandan allá por vuestra indolencia.
src segment: Don Raffaele dresses you, Don Raffaele pays your bail money, to get you out of jail when you've been messing around.

ref segment: Os he oído, y os lo digo clarito: ...somos cojonudos, pero nos estamos portando como gilipollas.
src segment: I've been watching you,listening to you, and here's my conclusion:

ref segment: Imaginé que os vería mañana. pero ya que estáis aquí, iré a ver a Paul mañana.
src segment: I figured I'd drive up tomorrow and see you, but as long as you're here, I'll go see Paul tomorrow.

ref segment: La providencia os sonreirá porque vuestra causa es justa.
src segment: Providence will smile upon you because your cause is just.

ref segment: Y os gustará saber que el gobierno os pagará el viaje de regreso.
src segment: And let it cheer you to know that your government has managed the money for your return home.

ref segment: Sòlo os estaba poniendo a prueba.
src segment: I was just testing you fellas.

ref segment: - Es mi profesión. ¿Eso os molesta?
src segment: - No, it's my job. It troubles you?

ref segment: O vuestro padre os regañará.
src segment: Father will scold you!

ref segment: ¿Quién os ha enviado?
src segment: Who invited you here, anyway?

ref segment: Me han ordenado que os haga saber que tenéis 45 minutos para rendiros.
src segment: I have been ordered to tell you that you have just 45 minutes to surrender.

ref segment: Llego tarde, no os enfadéis, sabéis que os quiero.
src segment: Goodbye, I'm late... Don't be cross. You know I love you both.

ref segment: Un brillante futuro os espera.
src segment: A wondrous future lies before you.

ref segment: ¿Cómo os van las cosas?
src segment: How are things between you?

ref segment: Ya veo, ya. ¿Quién es el hombre más mayor que os acompaña?
src segment: I see. Who was the young man with you?

ref segment: Vendrán a recogeros por la noche y os traerán por la mañana.
src segment: Guards will pick you up and bring you back every day.

ref segment: Ya sabéis que os aprecio mucho.
src segment: You know I'll miss you all.

ref segment: - Esperemos que no se os parezca.
src segment: - Let's hope he won't ressemble you.

ref segment: -¿Quién os avisó?
src segment: - Who notified you?

ref segment: En agradecimiento por esos servicios, y pese a la repugnancia que mostráis a los honores, en nombre de Su Majestad, os nombro alcalde de Montreuil sur Mer.
src segment: Mr. Mayor, I wanted to introduce myself as soon as I arrived. I am the new Police Inspector. I was waiting for you.

ref segment: París no os conviene.
src segment: Paris is no good for you.

ref segment: Pagaré el viaje a las Américas de vuestra familia y os daré una pequeña cantidad para que os establezcáis hasta que os den papeles.
src segment: I'll buy you and your family a trip to the Americas. I'll set you up with some money so that you can wait for... the acting parts that'll suit you.

ref segment: No os he visto desde que nos graduamos en la escuela.
src segment: I haven't seen you since we graduated from school.

ref segment: Creéis que no os entiendo.
src segment: You think I don't understand you.

ref segment: No os vi entonces.
src segment: Didn't see you then.

ref segment: Ya os lo he dicho, ha tenido que volver al cuartel, llamada de noche.
src segment: I told you. At the barracks, calling the roll.

ref segment: - ¿Quién os ha llamado?
src segment: - Who sent for you? - I called 'em.

ref segment: ¡Por una vez que os dejo solos!
src segment: Just once I leave you alone.

ref segment: ¿ Por qué no impedisteis que Ia llevara a Ia tumba como pago por eI cariño que os dio?
src segment: Why didn't you stand between him and my mother all those years, to repay the kindness she done you?

ref segment: salid a bailar. ¿ Qué os pasa?
src segment: Get in there and dance. What's the matter with you?

ref segment: No os reconozco.
src segment: I don't recognise you.

ref segment: El día menos pensado, os daré una sorpresa.
src segment: One of these days I'm going to surprise you both.

ref segment: ¿Qué os pasa?
src segment: Hey, what's got into you kids?

ref segment: Os he encontrado al fin.
src segment: I finally meet you again.

ref segment: Es mucho menos de lo que os debo y de lo que os deberé siempre.
src segment: I want no present from you! It is not a present, Pauline. It's still much less than what I owe you and will always owe you.

ref segment: Prometo que os llevaré...
src segment: I promise to take you wherever--

ref segment: Si os pillo, os doy patadas.
src segment: I catch you, I kick you.

ref segment: Lasky os envió.
src segment: Lasky sent you.

ref segment: Pensé que os encontraría aquí.
src segment: I thought I'd find you here.

ref segment: El mundo os necesita.
src segment: The world needs you both.

ref segment: Ahora os tengo comiendo de la mano.
src segment: Now I got you in the palm of my hand.

ref segment: Y os seguí a todos sitios. ¿Para qué?
src segment: - I followed you everywhere you went.

ref segment: ¡Os voy a comer como si fueseis mojicones!
src segment: I'm going to eat you as if you were bite-sized snacks!

ref segment: ¡Y os voy a comer como si fueseis pescadillas fritas!
src segment: And I'm going to eat you as if you were fried whiting!

ref segment: Estáis escuchando la voz que llamáis la Rosa de Tokio, que os habla desde el corazón del lmperio japonés, y os habla en vuestro idioma sobre una guerra que no podéis ganar.
src segment: You are listening to the voice you call Tokyo Rose, speaking to you from the heart of the Japanese empire, telling you in your own language of a war you cannot win.

ref segment: A los dos os digo, ¡largo!
src segment: The both of you, hit the trail.

ref segment: "Os bendigo a los dos y, Candy
src segment: "Bless you both, and Candy,

ref segment: Me alegraré cuando os vea en la sacristía juntos.
src segment: Oh... as for me... I'll be pleased to see you in the church together.

ref segment: - Eso os habrá sido útil.
src segment: - That did help you then.

ref segment: Nadie os podrá acusar de no ser cuidadosos con lo que habéis hecho porque es fantástico.
src segment: No one can ever accuse you of being careless with what you did because it's so beautiful.

ref segment: - Aella os matará por esto.
src segment: - Aella will kill you for this.

ref segment: No os he rescatado para entregaros a otro hombre.
src segment: I didn't steal you away just to give you to another man.

ref segment: Os amo desde el instante en que os vi.
src segment: And I loved you the moment I saw you.

ref segment: Supongamos que Aella os libera de vuestra promesa.
src segment: Suppose Aella releases you from your pledge.

ref segment: Con la aprobación de Dios o sin ella, os digo como rey que no será así.
src segment: With or without God's sanction, I tell you as your king this cannot be.

ref segment: No hace falta que os diga que tengáis cuidado. ¿Quién va primero?
src segment: No need to tell you to be careful. Well, who`s goin` first?

ref segment: Lo que os quiero pedir es que alarguéis la reunión hasta que yo vaya a hablar.
src segment: What I wanna ask is, will you keep the rally going till I get there and talk to you?

ref segment: ¡Una palabra ý os mato!
src segment: Say anything and I'll kill you.

ref segment: -Después que os detuvieran.
src segment: - Just after they detained you.

ref segment: A vosotros el tipo nunca os ha visto, mientras que a mí, ...si habla...
src segment: The guy has never seen you, while I... if he squeals...

ref segment: Sabemos incluso quién os ha traicionado en el golpe.
src segment: We know who sold you out.

ref segment: De ahora en adelante no dejéis la tienda hasta que yo os lo diga. ¿Entendido?
src segment: From now on, don't leave the store unless I tell you to. Understand?

ref segment: Bueno, si esas son sus carretas de suministros, él nos ha pedido que os acompañemos.
src segment: Well, if these are his supply wagons, he asked us to ride you in.

ref segment: Perdóneme, señor cardenal, que yo no os saludo en primer lugar, pero yo no sabía si iba a ver a mi hijo otra vez en esta vida, y yo estaba tan feliz por eso.
src segment: Forgive me, Your Eminence, that I did not greet you first, but I did not know whether I would see my child again in this lifetime, and I was so happy about it.

ref segment: Sois más bonita sin maquillaje... y ese vestido os favorece más.
src segment: You're prettier without make-up... and that dress suits you better.

ref segment: Teniendo en cuenta que no os habéis pinchado la cara... ¡no podréis actuar para Turcos o caníbales!
src segment: Watch out that I don't punch you in the face... so you can't perform for Turks and cannibals!

ref segment: Oí que llegabáis a casa... y os esperaba.
src segment: I heard you were coming home... so I waited for you.

ref segment: - ¿Dios os dijo que crearais Mau Mau?
src segment: - Did God tell you to create Mau Mau?

ref segment: - La guerra os va mal.
src segment: - You know the war goes badly for you.

ref segment: ¡Ya os dije que era un error el traerle, pero no escuchásteis!
src segment: I already told you, it was a mistake to bring him, But you would not listen to me!

ref segment: - Que, si te metes en líos, a la Sra. White la declararán loca, pero os encerrarán a las dos.
src segment: If you try anything like that, if you get into any trouble at all... it'll be Mrs. White that'll be adjudged crazy... but both of you'll be locked up.

ref segment: Vuestra madre os busca.
src segment: Your mother wants you.

ref segment: ¿Pero qué os pasa?
src segment: What's the matter with you two?

ref segment: Os lo pondré difícil, creo que os llevaban a una trampa.
src segment: I'll give you odds, Little Miss Sweetness and Light was leading you into a trap.

ref segment: No importa donde vayáis, ellos os seguirán.
src segment: No matter where you go, they'll follow you.

ref segment: No os puedo dejar atrás, no con ellos alrededor.
src segment: I can't leave you behind, not when they're still prowling around.

ref segment: Sí sabe Ma que destrozáis sus flores os echa, y no es que me importe.
src segment: Ah, let me go you silly pillock if ma catches you on her flowerbed, it's your lot.

ref segment: Ven, os llevo en coche.
src segment: Come, I'll take you with my car.

ref segment: ¡Os lo suplico!
src segment: A poor man implores you!

ref segment: Ya os lo enseñaré.
src segment: I'll show it to you.

ref segment: Eso prueba que os ama.
src segment: This proves that he loves you.

ref segment: Si no os ve más, sufrirá menos.
src segment: If she didn't see you anymore, she'd suffer less.

ref segment: No creo que eso os aflija mucho.
src segment: And I don't think this would be a great sacrifice for you.

ref segment: Veis, no os he abandonado nunca.
src segment: You see, I've never left you.

ref segment: Ella os quería, Judith.
src segment: She loved you, Judith.

ref segment: Yo os he obligado.
src segment: I forced you to it.

ref segment: - ¿Qué dice? Los señores Pennock os vieron en el cine.
src segment: - The Pennocks saw you in the Strand.

ref segment: Os he llamado inmediatamente.
src segment: I called you right away.

ref segment: Mi coche os recogerá a las 18:00.
src segment: My car will pick you up at 6:00.

ref segment: Nuestra famosa compañía regalo de todas las cabezas coronadas de Europa, os saluda.
src segment: - Don Antonio's world-famous troupe... - Sit down! Jesters to the crown heads of all Europe, greet you.

ref segment: Desde que llegásteis de España que os soy fiel, incluso cuando mandásteis a mi pobre marido a Cuzco.
src segment: Four years ago, when you arrived from Spain, I stood by you loyally... when you ordered my poor husband to Cuzco...

ref segment: ¡Y al estallar hagáis tanto ruido que del susto se mueran todos los que os rodean!
src segment: that, for the fear, all those next to you gotta die with you!

ref segment: Os dieron una pequeña paliza, ¿verdad?
src segment: Rough you up a bit, did they?

ref segment: Pues yo lanzo el desafío que Ivanhoe os habría lanzado si estuviera aquí.
src segment: Then I give you the challenge that Ivanhoe would give to you were he here, sir knight.

ref segment: Entonces, os llevaré.
src segment: Then I shall take you there.

ref segment: Aquí está mi mano, para sellar la promesa que os hice.
src segment: Here is my hand, in token of my pledge to you.

ref segment: ¿Quién os envió?
src segment: Who sent you?

ref segment: Hablad pronto, ¿quién os envió?
src segment: This is no time to lose your tongue. Who sent you?

ref segment: - Mi escudero os acompañará.
src segment: - My squire will attend you.

ref segment: Vuestro adversario os hirió, ¿os declaráis vencido?
src segment: Your foe has bloodied you, sir knight. Will you concede defeat?

ref segment: Mi hija os trajo aquí y curó vuestras heridas, Sir Ivanhoe.
src segment: My daughter brought you back here and tended your wound, Sir Ivanhoe.

ref segment: Que la muerte os aceche a toda hora, caminando, durmiendo, cabalgando.
src segment: May death blight you as you stand and walk and ride and sleep.

ref segment: - El tribunal ya os interrogará.
src segment: - The tribunal will address you when fitting, knight.

ref segment: Cinco horas de retraso, deberías pedir que os devolvieran el dinero.
src segment: Five hours late. That's some service for you. - You ought to get your money back.

ref segment: Gracias, cariño, por lo menos os he visto.
src segment: At least I saw you.

ref segment: Ayer fui al cine. ¿Queréis que os cuente la película?
src segment: I went to a movie last night, do you want me to tell you about it?

ref segment: Bueno, de hecho, os he seguido durante mucho tiempo.
src segment: Well, in fact I've followed you for a long time

ref segment: Ya os lo he dicho.
src segment: I told you already.

ref segment: Ya os lo dije.
src segment: I'm tellin' you.

ref segment: Si de verdad me amáis, os seré fiel.

ref segment: Antes de hablar con él, os aconsejo que busquéis los mojones.
src segment: But before you see him I urge you to find your boundary stones.

ref segment: Si os echan de los valles, vivid en las montañas, pero vivid.
src segment: If they drive you out of the valley, live on the mountain, but live.

ref segment: Dije que os alejarais del Barbary Coast. -Quedamos donde Cleggett.
src segment: I told you fools to stay away from the barbary coast, you were supposed to meet me at Clegetts.

ref segment: Os suplicaba que os lo lleváseis.
src segment: He begged you to take him away.

ref segment: ¿Es verdad que os suplicaba que lo matáseis?
src segment: Did he beg you to finish him off?

ref segment: ¿Es verdad que os suplicaba que le disparáseis, que no lo dejáseis vivo en manos de los rusos?
src segment: He begged you to shoot him, right? To not leave him alive for the Russians?

ref segment: ¿No querías que os escuchase?

ref segment: Nosotros mostramos el camino y el público os sigue sin darse cuenta.
src segment: We show the way and the public follows you without question.

ref segment: Hace una hora que os sigo.
src segment: It's been an hour since I've started chasing you!

ref segment: Entonces dejad que os ayude
src segment: Then let me help you.

ref segment: Todo cuanto os he dicho ha sido verdad.
src segment: Everything I've told you has been the truth.

ref segment: Desde que zarpamos de Nassau os he servido lealmente, y os serviré en las empresas que hemos planeado juntos para el futuro.
src segment: Since we sailed from Nassau I have served you loyally and well as I will serve you well in the ventures we have planned for the future together.

ref segment: Sólo os compadece.
src segment: He pitied you. Pity.

ref segment: Él os encontrará algún día.
src segment: Someday he'll find you.

ref segment: Te das cuenta, amor mío, os he preparado una nueva luna de miel.
src segment: You see, my true love I have arranged for you and your wife a new honeymoon.

ref segment: Me pagáis para que os aconseje.
src segment: You pay me to advise you.

ref segment: Aunque os saqué de la cloaca y os convertí de nuevo en un hombre.
src segment: Though I dragged you from a gutter, made you a man again.

ref segment: Joab me ordena que os urja a ir a Rabá a toda velocidad... a recibir la rendición del enemigo.
src segment: Joab bids me urge you to come to Rabbah with all speed to receive the surrender of your enemies.

ref segment: A través de Samuel, Él os eligió para liderar Su pueblo.
src segment: Through Samuel, he chose you to lead his people.

ref segment: Al resto os damos tiempo para salir del condado.

ref segment: Bueno, entonces os veré en la cena.

ref segment: ¿Quién os envía?

ref segment: Sí, el mismo que os da de comer a todos incluido tú.

ref segment: Ahora, chicos, recordad lo que os he dicho.

ref segment: Chicos, nunca os he dado un discurso antes.
src segment: Boys, I've never made a speech to you before.

ref segment: - Albert os llevará a vuestra mesa.
src segment: - Albert will take you to your table.

ref segment: Por eso os mandé llamar.

ref segment: No sé qué os separa pero no utilices a mi hermano para solucionarlo.
src segment: I don't know what's keeping you apart but I'd hate to think you were using my kid brother to solve your problem.

ref segment: Hagan el bien a quienes os odian.
src segment: Do good to them that hate you.

ref segment: Y orad por los que os ultrajan y os persiguen.
src segment: And pray for them that despitefully use you and persecute you.

src segment: The project needs you because you are fine technicians who are healthy and free to make your own decision.

ref segment: Otelo, la capacidad de resistencia de esta plaza os es bien conocida.
src segment: Othello, the fortitude of the place is vast known to you.

ref segment: Os lo diré una vez más, suplicad a Desdémona que os ayude a recobrar vuestro puesto.
src segment: Tell you yet once more, importune desdemona to put you in your place again.

ref segment: - ¡Dios os guarde, noble general!
src segment: - God save you, worthy general. - Pray you.

ref segment: El Dux y senadores de Venecia os saludan.
src segment: The duke and the senators of venice greet you.

ref segment: Que yo no os la nombre, castas estrellas.
src segment: Let me not name it for you, you chaste stars.

ref segment: Ella os puede dejar sin lengua.
src segment: She may put her tongue out at you.

ref segment: ¿Es que os desagrada?

ref segment: pero ¿y vuestro ingenio y valor? Recuerda esa muchacha que te ha ofrecido la cena. sus ojos no os evitaron.
src segment: Ah, but your wit, your courage, why that poor child who just now offered you your dinner, your saw it, her eyes did not avoid you.

ref segment: Dejad que os corrija algunos versos... y os conseguirá un buen teatro.
src segment: Let him rewrite a few lines here and there, and he'll find a theater for you.

ref segment: en voz baja que no os ama Roxana.
src segment: Yes, tell this to all the world, and then to me say very softly that she loves you not.

ref segment: Ella os ama.
src segment: That means you.

ref segment: Os ha robado una escena palabra por palabra.
src segment: He stole a scene from you, word for word.

ref segment: nunca os he amado.
src segment: Oh, no, no, my own dear love, I love you not.

ref segment: Que el Señor Misericordioso os conceda sus favores y os llene de la plena gracia de su bendición espiritual para que podáis vivir juntos en este mundo terrenal y disfrutéis en el venidero de la vida eterna. Amén.
src segment: The Lord mercifully with his favor look upon you and fill you with spiritual benediction and grace that ye may so live together in this life that in the world to come, ye may have life everlasting.

ref segment: Tu padre quiere que sepas que os veréis pronto.
src segment: Your father said to tell you he'll see you soon.

ref segment: Me temo que esto os pone en la situación de tener que echarme.
src segment: I'm afraid this puts you in the embarrassing position of keeping me out.

ref segment: Permitid que os escolte a vuestros aposentos.
src segment: Allow me to escort you to your chamber.

ref segment: Como iba diciendo, espero que el bruto montañés no os haya asustado.
src segment: As I was saying, I hope the mountain brute didn't frighten you.

ref segment: ¿Ha sido Dardo quien os ha convertido a todos en cobardes?
src segment: Was it Dardo made skulking cowards out of you all?

ref segment: Seguid por la senda del pantano y el olor a muerte os guiará.
src segment: Follow the marsh road and the smell of death will lead you.

ref segment: Me temo que los proscritos os han engañado, Ulrich.
src segment: I'm afraid the outlaws have bewitched and beguiled you, Ulrich.

ref segment: Alessandro os ha traicionado.
src segment: Alessandro's betrayed you.

ref segment: El Señor os ha puesto en mi camino para socorrerme.
src segment: Brother pigs, the Lord has placed you on my path to help me.

ref segment: ¡Con tal de que no os vuelva a ver, porque sino os rompo la cara!
src segment: Just don't let me see you again or I'll break your skulls open!

ref segment: Te pido que os marchéis de Las Furias de una vez por todas.
src segment: I'm asking you to leave The Furies once and for all.

ref segment: Dígale a su padre que os acompañaré.
src segment: And you can tell your father I should see you at home.

ref segment: Salid los dos, antes de que os eche fuera.
src segment: Get out of here, both of you, before I throw you out.

ref segment: - ¿Quieres que os ayude?
src segment: - You want me to help you?

ref segment: Ya que os he desconcertado, me voy.
src segment: And having confused you, I have to go.

ref segment: ¿Quantrill os ha enviado para espiar?
src segment: So Quantrill sent you in to do a little spying, huh?

ref segment: Espero que esto no os haya asustado demasiado.
src segment: I hope this didn't put you out too much.

ref segment: ¿Queréis que os arreste?
src segment: Do you want me to run you in?

ref segment: ¡Ya os lo he dicho y os lo repito:
src segment: I already told you!

ref segment: Preferiría olvidar que os he encontrado
src segment: I'd be glad to disremember I ever seen you boys.

ref segment: Vosotros id al hotel Shalimar y os llamaré a las 11.
src segment: You two go over to Shalimar Hotel here,and I'll call you by eleven

ref segment: Ya os lo he dicho, es mi prioridad.
src segment: I told you I'm rushing through another to take its place.

ref segment: - ¿Teneis miedo de que os ataque?
src segment: - Aren't you afraid I might gang up on you?

ref segment: ¿Qué os pasa?
src segment: What's the matter with you?

ref segment: Oh, señor, ¿es la gota que os molesta?
src segment: Oh, sir, is the straw that bothers you?

ref segment: Yo os herí, ella os curó.
src segment: I will hurt, she healed you.

ref segment: ¡Si supierais cómo os odio!

ref segment: No os traicionaré.

ref segment: ¿Quién os ha enviado para matarme?
src segment: Who sent you to kill me?

ref segment: Yo os hubiera tenido confianza hace mucho tiempo, pero no me siento inclinado a hacerlo. ¿Qué quieres decir, que no merecemos tu confianza?
src segment: I would have taken you into my confidence long ago, but I haven't felt inclined to do so do you mean that we don't deserve your confidence?

ref segment: Los federales os dispararán por todas partes.
src segment: How are you ducking bullets, Joe? Yeah, the feds will be shooting at you from all sides!

ref segment: Sí, es cierto. ¿Cuánto tiempo os dio, padre?
src segment: - How much time did he give you, Father?

ref segment: Y Cora os dirá que si Bill no consigue un empleo pronto... tendrá que ponerse ella a trabajar.
src segment: And Cora will tell you that if Bill doesn't get a job soon, she'll have to go to work herself.

ref segment: Pero lo que os hubiera podido pasar... no podéis ni imaginarlo, gallinitas.
src segment: And what could have happened to two mayflowers like you, you couldn't even imagine.

ref segment: Mi compañero de trabajo os vio.
src segment: My coworker saw you yesterday.

ref segment: ¡Venga, que no se os escape!
src segment: Come on, don't let it get away from you!

ref segment: Permitidme ahora que os devuelva el favor.
src segment: Allow me today to repay you.

ref segment: Como castigo por habéroslo impuesto, os pediría que me lo devolvierais.
src segment: As punishment for forcing it on you, I'd ask you to give it back.

ref segment: Tened piedad de este enamorado que os implora.
src segment: Take pity on this lover who implores you.

ref segment: Habéis cumplido fielmente la misión que os encomendé.
src segment: You've fulfilled to the utmost the mission I sent you on.

ref segment: Yo también os amo, mi distinguido y viejo inglés.
src segment: I love you too, you distinguished old Englishman.

ref segment: Veréis, yo os robo algo y lo escondo.
src segment: You see, I rob you of something, hide it.

ref segment: ¿Que habéis estado haciendo desde la última vez que os vi?
src segment: What have you been doing since I last saw you?

ref segment: - No parece que os haya gustado.
src segment: - It doesn't seem to please you.

ref segment: Acampar durante unas pocas horas... os refrescará para la ceremonia de la coronación de mañana.
src segment: I felt my making camp for a few hours... would freshen you for the coronation ceremonies in the morning.

ref segment: Maldita sea, pensé que os había perdido.
src segment: Confound it, I thought I'd lost you.

ref segment: "Cuidad las formas y nadie os molestará."
src segment: Why I guess Doc Keller can cure anything that ails you the way he runs this town.

ref segment: "El libro de familia que se os dará luego,
src segment: "The marriage book that he offers you today

ref segment: "El os concede, y a la vez, os compromete como esposa
src segment: "He dismisses you as a servant and takes you as a wife

ref segment: ¡No os van a dejar hasta ver el despegue!
src segment: They won't even let you through to the starting area!

ref segment: Quieren que os peleéis entre vosotros.
src segment: They want to get you at each other's throats.

ref segment: Oh, oye, os diré por qué os he pedido que vinieseis.
src segment: Oh, say, I'll tell you why I asked you down here.

ref segment: Os envío mi mensaje desde el corazón.
src segment: My message comes to you straight from my heart

ref segment: Ni siquiera os diré que lo que habéis hecho está mal.
src segment: I ain't even going to tell you that you've been doing wrong.

ref segment: Nunca sabréis cómo os admiraba en aquellos días.
src segment: You'll never know how I admired and looked up to you in those days.

ref segment: El Archiduque de Austria no es tan buen candidato, pero os pretende.
src segment: The archduke of Austria is not so good a match, but he is eager to marry you.

ref segment: Por dos monedas os pondría sobre mis rodillas.
src segment: For two farthings, I'd put you over my knee.

ref segment: Casaos con quien ella elija y os reconocerá como heredera del trono de Inglaterra.
src segment: Marry the man she chooses and she'll recognize you as the next heir to the throne of England.

ref segment: Su Majestad, os ruego que no se apresure.
src segment: Your Majesty, I beg of you not to be rash.

ref segment: Jamás soñé que os tendría entre mis brazos.
src segment: I never dreamed I'm to hold you in my arms.

ref segment: Perdí a Bothwell, que os mantenía a todos contenidos.
src segment: I lost Bothwell, who held you all in check.

ref segment: Os necesitaban en su plan para probar su mentira de que os había deshonrado.
src segment: They had to have you in their scheme to prove their lie, that I dishonored you.

ref segment: Dijo que os estaría esperando con las gaitas tocando.
src segment: He said he'd be waiting for you with the bagpipes playing.

ref segment: Sabéis que mi sangre os manchará.
src segment: You know my blood will stain you.

ref segment: Su Majestad os recuerda que debéis regresar sin falta mañana por la mañana.
src segment: His Majesty reminds you that you are to return tomorrow morning without fail.

ref segment: "Que os sirva de lección.
src segment: "Let this be a lesson to you.

ref segment: Lo que os vengo predicando desde hace años.
src segment: What I've been preaching to you two for years!

ref segment: Os diré para qué os he llamado.
src segment: Now, listen, this is what I want to see you about.

ref segment: En virtud de lo convenido, os protegeré de vosotros mismos.
src segment: I made a gentlemen's agreement with you to protect you from yourselves.

ref segment: - No me deis la lata u os hecho.
src segment: - No lip or I'll throw you all out.

ref segment: Pero dejad que os diga a ambos que he...
src segment: Well, let me tell you, the both of you, that I've... .

ref segment: Aunque os ha costado un poco capturarlo.
src segment: Took you a long while to get him, though.

ref segment: Y luego la ley os colgará.
src segment: And then the law is gonna hang you.
